news.title: UnitedHealth says it is cooperating with DOJ investigation into Medicare billing practices
news.summary: UnitedHealth says it has begun complying with formal criminal and civil requests from the DOJ. In a securities filing, UnitedHealth said it has started complying with the DOJ's requests.

news.title: Sydney Sweeney sparks latest meme stock rally as American Eagle soars 10%
news.summary: GoPro, Krispy Kreme, Opendoor Technologies and Kohl's have all drawn attention from meme stock traders this week. GoPro, KrisPy Kreme and Opendedoor Technologies have all drew attention from memes stock traders.

news.title: Tesla shares drop 6% in premarket trading after auto sales plunge again
news.summary: Tesla is facing stiffer competition globally from electric vehicle players, especially low-cost competitors from China. Tesla is facing competition from electric car players in China.

news.title: Jeffrey Epstein accomplice Ghislaine Maxwell expected to meet with DOJ on Thursday
news.summary: The Trump administration has tried to quell pressure to release files about Jeffrey Epstein, the dead sex offender who once was a friend to the president.

news.title: Trump to visit Federal Reserve, escalating campaign against Chair Powell
news.summary: This is the first time in nearly two decades that an American president will be making an official trip to the central bank. It is also the first visit by a U.S. president to the European Central Bank since 1998.

news.title: Is there a new meme stock? American Eagle shares soar hours after Sydney Sweeney campaign announcement.
news.summary: A-list actress Sydney Sweeney appears to be driving hopes among the retail crowd that her fall campaign for the retailer will boost its sagging shares.

news.title: Jobless claims drop for sixth straight week, as labor market is showing no signs of stress
news.summary: Initial claims for state unemployment benefits fell by 4,000 to a total of 217,000 in the week that ended July 19. That’s the sixth straight weekly decline. Claims are now at their lowest level since mid-April.

news.title: Why Tesla analysts are mostly upbeat about earnings, but investors aren’t happy
news.summary: Analysts were mostly upbeat about Tesla’s earnings, even as investors worried about CEO Elon Musk's comments about potential “rough” quarters ahead.

news.title: Retail investors are driving this market. And Wall Street knows it.
news.summary: Right now it’s the retail investors that are in control, strategists across Wall Street say. “Right now, the retail investor is in charge,” says one.

news.title: American Airlines warns of a surprise loss amid concerns over future travel demand
news.summary: Airline reports improvement in managing ’disruptive operational events’ such as dangerous summer storms. Airline reports improved performance in dealing with ‘dangerous summer storms’
